page.title: 11Churches in Scarborough
page.content: There are lots of different types of churches in Scarborough. For example {St.Mary's Church}on the Castle Headland is the {Parish Church}of Scarborough.{St.Andrew's Church}is on Ramshill.{Queen Street Methodist {Central Hall}is on Queen Street.{ {St.Martin's Church}doesn't just have services because they have different groups in the Church. They have a painting club which make paintings to sell. They put them up so everybody can see them. Another group is the Ladies Working Party who have recently made some new kneelers. The church is quite famous for its stained glass windows. They have a little book stall at the church.{St.Martin's School helped to design the cover for the church magazine.The church shares the magazine with {St. Michael's Church.
